custom-action.name: Connect
custom-action.description:
This action opens a new SAP connection. The established connection is contextual to the User Path and will be used to perform all the other actions (Click, Press, etc.).
Possible parameters are: - connectionString (required): The connection parameters to the SAP GUI server. Default value is "/H/192.168.1.1/S3201". - overrideLogonFolder (optional): The path to the SAP logon folder. Leave empty for autodetection or setting on Load Generator side. - noGuiMode (optional): GUI mode disabled. During a "Check User Path" process, the GUI mode is always enabled. Default value is "true".
